title: Google Steps into Healthcare AI, Introducing Search Engine for Medical Records
description: In a major stride toward revolutionizing healthcare, Google’s cloud division unveiled a cutting-edge AI-powered tool destined to reshape how medical professionals access and interpret patient records. This transformative technology aims to alleviate the burdensome task of manually collating medical data, presenting a unified view of a patient’s history, irrespective of diverse formats and storage locations. ... Read more
